thread.title: Copious Wins 3 Best of Industry WebAwards in Digital Commerce and B2B
thread.title_full: Copious Wins 3 Best of Industry WebAwards in Digital Commerce and B2B

author: admin
title: Copious Wins 3 Best of Industry WebAwards in Digital Commerce and B2B
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/9/2015 @ 2:15 PM   Copious 
PORTLAND, Ore., Sept. 9, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Portland-based digital commerce agency Copious ( copio.us ) celebrated wins in three industry categories in the 17th annual WebAwards with clients Nau and ID Experts. Produced by the Web Marketing Association, the awards are the longest running annual website award competition and are a recognized standard of excellence in digital design and development. 
High end performance retailer Nau earned "Best of" recognition in the Shopping category. Copious designed and developed around a unique visual language and content-rich UX to create a best-in-class ecommerce experience. Driven by a customized integration of the Magento Enterprise platform, the responsive site is beautiful and engaging for users - all while driving increased revenue for the brand. 
ID Experts , an industry leader in data breach prevention, received accolades in the Consulting and Professional Services categories. Their site, designed and developed by Copious, reinforces simplicity, authenticity and confidence through a streamlined responsive design to drive leads for the business. Intuitive UI and distinct visual branding helped earn the site recognition as a two-time "Best of" industry leader. 
"We could not be more thrilled to see our clients in the spotlight," said Copious CEO Patrick Ezell. "From software to consumer goods, we love working with clients to push the boundaries for great omnichannel commerce experiences. Winning WebAwards for the work is great industry validation that we're helping them deliver great user experiences." 
About Copious 
Copious is a digital agency that creates user-centered experiences to drive value for clients and engage customers. A focused approach to strategy, design, and engineering guides human-centered commerce experiences, web platforms, and mobile applications. With deep partnerships at the core of every client engagement, we deliver digital solutions that are fast, scalable, and reliable. Find out more at http://copio.us/ . 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/copious-wins-3-best-of-industry-webawards-in-digital-commerce-and-b2b-300140354.html 
SOURCE Copious
